page.title: 09DEEPING ST.JAMES VIDEOS
page.content: There are 4 kinds of video systems. They are VHS,Betamax,Video 2000 and VCR which is not made anymore.They cost from around Â£400 to Â£650.You can have remote control for your video. Videos became more popular in recent years as the price of going to the cinema increased,and there were fewer cinemas.People also like watching films in the comfort of their own home. The video 2000 system is the first video in which the video cassette can be turned over.This gives a much longer recording time for a given length of tape ,but you need to be there to turn the cassette over. You can hire video tapes for any length of time.If you hire a video tape over night it would cost on average between Â£1.00 and Â£1.50.
